Props and state are interchangeable and serve the same purpose.
Props are used for styling, while state is used for scripting.

JSX is a framework for testing React components.

What is the purpose of the <meta> tag in HTML, and where is it typically placed?
options: The <meta> tag is used to define metadata about the HTML document, such as character set, author, and viewport settings. It is typically placed within the <head> section.
The <meta> tag is used to create hyperlinks and is placed within the <body> section.
The <meta> tag is used to embed multimedia content and is placed within the <footer> section.
The <meta> tag is used to define the structure of the HTML document and is placed within the <article> section.
PL78RhpUUKSwfYr_bKHq7SWfTCBGad_xxP.correctAnswer: The <meta> tag is used to define metadata about the HTML document, such as character set, author, and viewport settings. It is typically placed within the <head> section.
